Bodysite Location Modifier

SNOMED-CT concepts modifying the anatomic location

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    419161000Unilateral left
    419465000Unilateral right
    51440002Bilateral
    261183002Upper
    261122009Lower
    255561001Medial
    49370004Lateral
    264217000Superior
    261089000Inferior
    255551008Posterior
    351726001Below
    352730000Above
